jobs.Description: The design team member will use their creative skills to make graphics for things such as HackMerced stickers, T-Shirts, and logos.  Will also work with the marketing team. Additionally, will use their creative skills to make graphics and mock ups for an elegant website design.
Requirements: Can think out side the box

jobs.Description: The logistics director will work with various departments within HackMerced to book venues, develop and run schedules, and order services and supplies. Will also hold the role of Volunteer Manager which will have the responsibility of recruiting, managing and educating potential volunteers for HackMerced events.
Requirements: Must be flexible and able to solve unexpected tasks
Multitasking
Experienced with documented work
Experience in talking with OSL
Experience in using room reservation software
Experience in event planning outside UC Merced
Optional: Students with connections to other universities, including student, staff and faculty

jobs.Description: The logistics team member will work along-side the logistics director to coordinate, plan and create events at UC Merced and the Merced community. Additionally, they will work to create, organize, and run non-hackathon HackMerced related events. They are self-guided with support from the director of HackMerced and from the logistics director to successfully hold events both during and outside the hackathon. These events can be anything from workshops, mini-hackathons, main event, speaks/talks, info sessions, tabling, etc.
Requirements: Experience in throwing events at UC Merced
Must be flexible and able to solve unexpected tasks
Multitasking
Optional: Experience in using room reservation software
Experience in event planning outside UC Merced

jobs.Description: The director of finance will help secure sponsorships, make sure vendors get paid, and manage the cash flow and budget. Will also be required to handle all requests with ASUCM, ICC, OSL, and Vanguard.
Requirements: Manages budget and controls expenses effectively.
Ethical Conduct
Strategic Thinking
Experienced with Excel/Google spreadsheets
Worked in a financial-related position before
Optional: Experience in budgeting Experience in working at a club at UCM as a Treasurer

jobs.Description: The finance team member will help secure sponsorships, make sure vendors get paid, and manage the cash flow and budget. May represent the Finance Director at a ASUCM, ICC, OSL, and Vanguard meeting. Additionally, they will predict trends in spending and growth. Build budgets for events as well as locate areas to cut costs and research new ways to efficiently spend money.
Requirements: Manages budget and controls expenses effectively.
Ethical Conduct
Strategic Thinking
Optional: Worked in a financial-related position before

jobs.Description: The Director of Marketing will be planning and coordinating marketing campaigns for HackMerced, that can include emails, social media posts, blogs, and video. They also work with the Logistics team to build and create non-primary Hackathon events.
Requirements: Proficient and independent in drafting up e-mails in a professional environment
Excellent Writing and Communication skills
Students with connections to other universities, including student, staff and faculty
Responds to emails in a timely manner
Optional: Has a blog, medium, or publishes content online
Has done social media management in the past

jobs.Description: The marketing team member will work with students from other schools to establish the HackMerced brand at their respective campuses. Will work to produce captivating marketing strategies for HackMerced. Will produce emails for HackMerced that will inform students about HackMercedâ€™s events and activities. They will work with the Marketing Director to make interesting and informative posts for HackMerced as well as communicate and interact with the HackMerced community online.
Requirements: Proficient and independent in drafting up e-mails
Excellent writing skills
Experience with Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter
Optional: Has a blog, medium, or publishes content online
Has done social media management in the past
Has writing portfolio with published articles, social media marketing presence

jobs.Description: Director of Engineering position will be in charge of the engineering team and leading them to create new software and features. Will also be in charge of building the HackMerced site and creating a place for people to apply for our event. Will have the freedom to work on other projects and delegate out to team members.
Requirements: Proficiency in one of the following: Javascript, C/C++, Java
Experience in MVC ecosystems (React, Angular, Vue)
Knowledgeable with servers and databases

jobs.Description: The engineering team member position will allow one to stretch their skills to build applications in the following fields webdev, hardware, devops, mobile development. Will be in working in a team to create new software and features. Additionally, they will work with the design and marketing teams to push HackMerced's brand.
Requirements: Proficiency in one of the following: Javascript, C/C++, Java
Willing to learn and work on a team
